LanguageData.VFEE_GrandTable.label: величний стіл
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandTable.description: A luxurious, beautiful gold-inlaid table fit for the highborn, it is a work of art in itself. People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandTable_Blueprint.label: grand table (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandTable_Blueprint_Install.label: grand table (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandTable_Frame.label: grand table (building)
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandTable_Frame.description: A luxurious, beautiful gold-inlaid table fit for the highborn, it is a work of art in itself. People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandChair.label: величний стілець
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandChair.description: A comfortable and elegant chair, it is a work of art in itself. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandChair_Blueprint.label: grand chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandChair_Blueprint_Install.label: grand chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandChair_Frame.label: grand chair (building)
LanguageData.VFEE_GrandChair_Frame.description: A comfortable and elegant chair, it is a work of art in itself. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.VFEE_ImperialBanner.label: імперський прапор
LanguageData.VFEE_ImperialBanner.description: A decorative strip of cloth hanging from a vertical wooden frame. Appropriate for royal rooms.
LanguageData.VFEE_ImperialBanner_Blueprint.label: imperial banner (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_ImperialBanner_Frame.label: imperial banner (building)
LanguageData.VFEE_ImperialBanner_Frame.description: A decorative strip of cloth hanging from a vertical wooden frame. Appropriate for royal rooms.
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalStool.label: королівський стілець
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalStool.description: A luxurious gold-inlaid stool fit for the nobility. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalStool_Blueprint.label: royal stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalStool_Blueprint_Install.label: royal stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalStool_Frame.label: royal stool (building)
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalStool_Frame.description: A luxurious gold-inlaid stool fit for the nobility. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone.label: трон для медитації стеларха
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone.description: A titanic, ornate chair, designed for a dignity-focused psycaster to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up psyfocus. For dignity psycasters, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of psyfocus gain.
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone_Blueprint.label: stellic meditation throne (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone_Frame.label: stellic meditation throne (building)
LanguageData.VFEE_StellicThrone_Frame.description: A titanic, ornate chair, designed for a dignity-focused psycaster to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up psyfocus. For dignity psycasters, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of psyfocus gain.
LanguageData.VFEE_Candelabra.label: канделябр
LanguageData.VFEE_Candelabra.description: An elaborate, artistic electrical standing lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.VFEE_Candelabra_Blueprint.label: candelabra (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_Candelabra_Blueprint_Install.label: candelabra (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_Candelabra_Frame.label: candelabra (building)
LanguageData.VFEE_Candelabra_Frame.description: An elaborate, artistic electrical standing lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalMirror.label: королівське дзеркало
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalMirror.description: A beautiful and elegant mirror. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one mirror near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalMirror_Blueprint.label: royal mirror (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalMirror_Blueprint_Install.label: royal mirror (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalMirror_Frame.label: royal mirror (building)
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalMirror_Frame.description: A beautiful and elegant mirror. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one mirror near the same bed has no effect.
